valueProp: Kenneth M. Sigelman & Associates is a premier law firm with a track record of success in medical malpractice and serious injury cases.

testimonalData.text: Ken showed tenacity. I am very thankful for finding him. He did justice for us. I would highly recommend him to everyone.
